apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a loving embrace between two women, rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and vibrant, warm skin tones. The gentle 3D shading and realistic lighting on Apple devices give the figures a sense of depth and genuine connection, while the bright red heart nestled between them pulses with affection. It beautifully symbolizes same-sex love, partnership, and deep emotional bonds, offering a visually rich and inclusive representation for digital communication.
